Posts.Content: Scaredella wrote: During this waiting period for diagnostic of microcalcifications, I'm an emotional roller coaster. I'm depressed, I'm scared, I'm worried and afraid to cry. If menopause did not have me a mess, this does. I asked my husband if this is BC, what do we do? Men seem to never think about the what if. That makes me angry at him I am a emotional mess. Everyone have a great week and Wednesday cannot come fast enough for me. Luv you my sisters in the journey:) Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: My emotions are mixed Scaredella mdg

Posts.Content: Aug 26, 2013 07:33AM Scaredella wrote: Thank you again for putting my mind on the right track @Bessie
Posts.Title: My emotions are mixed Scaredella mdg

Posts.Content: Sep 5, 2013 03:29PM Scaredella wrote: It is not too bad. The most uncomfortable part for me was them getting my left breast in mamagram machine while laying on my side. Once they locate area they num you pretty good. Not much pain there. The incision is tiny very tiny. Not much bleeding. A little but not much. Tylenol will take care of any discomfort once you are home. Relax if you can really not bad. The waiting on results is the worst.
Posts.Title: what to expect at/after stereotactic biopsy? lynnapin MelissaDallas

Posts.Content: Sep 5, 2013 05:37PM Scaredella wrote: All I can say is stay strong and hopefully nothing to worry about. This is a beatable disease if you stay proactive with your treatments. Good luck to you. This monster must be defeated.

Posts.Content: Sep 4, 2013 04:42PM Scaredella wrote: Amen and mine was b9 too. I'm here for the long haul with my sisters in the struggle. This is a scary monster and can show his head anytime. Si glad for your good news.
Posts.Title: the waiting is over jushavinfun Totoro

Posts.Content: Scaredella wrote: Good morning my sisters in the struggle for a cure I hope your morning is good. Tomorrow is my biopsy day. I called the imaging center this morning to ask a fee questions in fear and the nurse said my microcalcifications are BR-4 what ever that means and that they use that so a biopsy can be performed. I asked her about previous images from last year and before and she said the calcification a were not there. I said to her that my Gyno said to me years ago I have very cystic breast and could that cause them. Well anxiously waiting and trying not to worry thanks to our sister here Bessie. I am trying. My question is if at this stage br4 is that mean early? I really do luv you guys in the spirit and paying for benign. But please know this if benign I will never leave this site. Ella Log in to post a reply
